titleStmt.title: O raree show, o pritee show. Will you see my fine show.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by date of Wing W752.
Verse: "HERE be De ver pritte Show, just come from Parry ..."
Cf. Wing W752 which has "pretty-show" and an imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
